content:
Special operations snipers destroy Russian invaders in the Avdiivsky direction.

About thisreportedand published a corresponding video command of the Special Operations forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

As it is noted, the snipers of the 3rd SCO regiment during the observation in the Avdeevsky direction recorded the movement of enemy servicemen and opened fire on the enemy, all the invaders were destroyed.

“We provide the cover of units, destroy sabotage and intelligence groups and enemy surveillance points in our area of responsibility. Our coordinated work has a positive impact on the performance of combat missions, ”the sniper said with the cherry call sign.

As reported by the Armyinform, Aviation and RacketrsthinnedRows of living power and enemy equipment: destroyed.
title: SCO snipers showed how the invaders are destroying in the Avdiivsky direction
description: This was reported and published by the appropriate video command of the Special Operations Forces ...
author: Army Inform
